svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Outdoor air pollution deaths by age, World
Annual number of premature deaths attributed to outdoor (ambient) air pollution, measured for both particulate matter
and ozone exposure. This is measured as attributed deaths linked to all established mortality and disease risks from
Source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease
